verbose_text: Given that depletion of CXCR2 could effectively impair IL-8 or GRO-alpha-mediated TAK1 / NFkappaB signaling and ovarian cancer aggressiveness, it was of great importance to investigate any CXCR2 inhibitors that could be used as effective treatments for controlling the peritoneal metastases of ovarian cancer.
evidence: CXCR2 could effectively impair IL-8 or GRO-alpha-mediated TAK1/NFkappaB
